thread.title: Justin Bieber gets new tattoo
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber gets new tattoo - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Justin Bieber gets new tattoo
text:
Los Angeles: Singer Justin Bieber has got himself inked again -- this time with the title of his new album.
  A photo posted by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) onOct 6, 2015 at 2:44pm PDT
The 21-year-old has had "Purpose" inked across his abs, days after he announced it would be the name of his fourth studio record, reports femalefirst.co.uk.
His latest piece of body art, which sits just above his belly button. He has other tattoos like the word "Forgive" on one hip and a small bird on his other hip.
And it's not the first time the "Baby" hitmaker has etched one of his album titles into his skin as he already has his 2012 record name "Believe" tattooed on the inside of his left arm.
The latest tattoo comes just a month before the album's release on November 13, when he will go head-to-head in the charts with One Direction, who will release their fifth record "Made In The A.M." on the same day.
